title: Towards credible visual model interpretation with path attribution. (arXiv:2305.14395v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Originally inspired by game-theory, path attribution framework stands out among the post-hoc model interpretation tools due to its axiomatic nature. However, recent developments show that this framework can still suffer from counter-intuitive results. Moreover, specifically for deep visual models, the existing path-based methods also fall short on conforming to the original intuitions that are the basis of the claimed axiomatic properties of this framework. We address these problems with a systematic investigation, and pinpoint the conditions in which the counter-intuitive results can be avoided for deep visual model interpretation with the path attribution strategy. We also devise a scheme to preclude the conditions in which visual model interpretation can invalidate the axiomatic properties of path attribution. translated_title: 基于路径归因的可信视觉模型解释的探索
translated_abstract: 路径归因框架最初受博弈论启发，由于其公理性质而在后处理模型解释工具中脱颖而出。然而，最近的发展表明，该框架仍然可能出现反直觉的结果。此外，特别针对深度视觉模型，现有的基于路径的方法也无法符合该框架所宣称的公理属性的基础直觉。我们通过系统的研究解决了这些问题，并确定了使用路径归因策略进行深度视觉模型解释可以避免反直觉结果的条件。我们还设计了一种方案，以防止视觉模型解释无效化路径归因的公理属性。这些见解被结合成一种方法，实现了可靠的视觉模型解释。我们的发现通过多个数据集、模型和评估得到了实证确定。
tldr: 本研究通过研究发现，在深度视觉模型解释中使用路径归因策略时，可以通过特定条件避免反直觉结果。并提出一种方案帮助防止视觉模型解释无效化路径归因的公理属性，从而实现可靠的视觉模型解释。
en_tdlr: This study found that counter-intuitive results could be avoided for deep visual model interpretation with the path attribution strategy, given specific conditions. A scheme was proposed to prevent visual model interpretation from invalidating the axiomatic properties of path attribution, leading to reliable visual model interpretation.
